name: Flippy Discs - A Multiplayer Othello Game
name_original: Flippy Discs - A Multiplayer Othello Game
description:
Flip your friend's discs. Flip the computer's discs. Watch two computer opponents flip each other's discs, if that's your thing.

Surround your opponent's pieces to capture them and control the board, but be cautious – the tide can turn in an instant.

Universal purchase offers pass-and-play multiplayer game board action on your Apple TV, iPad, iPhone, and iPod Touch.
